h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ yaṃ ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^P5.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ? atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti? sabbatthapaññatti, padesapaññatti? sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti? ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññatti? pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ? katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati? catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti? sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ^a^V0.0002^ea^ katamo āpattikkhandho? channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti? catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ? sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati? ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo? kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ? kā vipatti? kā sampatti? kā paṭipatti? kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ? ke sikkhanti? ke sikkhitasikkhā? kattha ṭhitaṃ? ke dhārenti? kassa vacanaṃ? kenābhatanti?

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ ^a^T0.0002^ea^ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? vesāliyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sudinnaṃ kalandaputtaṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? sudinno kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ ^a^P5.0002^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññattīti? ekā paññatti, dve anupaññattiyo. anuppannapaññatti ^a^M0.0002^ea^ tasmiṃ natthi. sabbatthapaññatti, padesapaññattīti? sabbatthapaññatti. sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññattīti? sādhāraṇapaññatti. ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññattīti? ubhatopaññatti. pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannanti? nidānogadhaṃ, nidānapariyāpannaṃ. katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchatīti? dutiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati. catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipattīti? sīlavipatti. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandhoti? pārājikāpattikkhandho. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti? āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammatīti? dvīhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? paññatti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti? paññatti pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ. kā vipattīti? asaṃvaro vipatti. kā ^a^T0.0003^ea^ sampattīti? saṃvaro sampatti. kā paṭipattīti? na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. {a0 ni0 10.31} kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattanti? dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, saṅghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya. ke sikkhantīti? sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti. ke sikkhitasikkhāti? arahanto sikkhitasikkhā ^a^V0.0003^ea^. kattha ṭhitanti? sikkhākāmesu ṭhitaṃ. ke dhārentīti? yesaṃ vattati te dhārenti. kassa vacananti? bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. kenābhatanti? paramparābhataṃ --

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? rājagahe paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? dhaniyaṃ kumbhakāraputtaṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti ^a^P5.0004^ea^, na vācato; siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ tatiyaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? vesāliyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sambahule ^a^V0.0005^ea^ bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? sambahulā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. channaṃ ^a^T0.0006^ea^ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato; siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? vesāliyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato; siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññattīti? ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi. sabbattha paññatti, padesapaññattīti? sabbatthapaññatti. sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññattīti ^a^T0.0008^ea^? asādhāraṇapaññatti. ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññattīti? ekatopaññatti. pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannanti? nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannaṃ. katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchatīti? tatiye ^a^M0.0006^ea^ uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati ^a^P5.0005^ea^. catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipattīti? sīlavipatti. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandhoti? saṅghādiseso āpattikkhandho. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti? āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammatīti? dvīhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? paññatti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti? paññatti pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ. kā vipattīti? asaṃvaro vipatti. kā sampattīti? saṃvaro sampatti. kā paṭipattīti? na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. {a0 ni0 10.31} kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññattoti? dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, saṅghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ ^a^T0.0009^ea^ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya. ke sikkhantīti? [03] 9^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha ^a^M0.0008^ea^. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena ^a^T0.0010^ea^ saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato...pe0....

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā ^a^V0.0009^ea^ udāyī mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato; siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā ^a^T0.0011^ea^ udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato; siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ yaṃ ^a^M0.0011^ea^ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo aniṃyato kattha paññatto? kaṃ ārabbha? kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ? atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti, sabbatthapaññatti padesapaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti asādhāraṇapaññatti, ekatopaññatti ubhatopaññatti, pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ, katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati, catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo, kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ, kā vipatti, kā sampatti, kā paṭipatti, kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññatto, ke ^a^T0.0015^ea^ sikkhanti, ke sikkhitasikkhā, kattha ṭhitaṃ, ke dhārenti, kassa vacanaṃ kenābhatanti.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo aniyato kattha ^a^V0.0012^ea^ paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṅkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññattīti? ekā paññatti. anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi. sabbatthapaññatti, padesapaññattīti? sabbatthapaññatti. sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññattīti? asādhāraṇapaññatti. ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññattīti? ekatopaññatti. pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannanti? nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannaṃ. katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchatīti? catutthena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati. catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipattīti? siyā sīlavipatti siyā ācāravipatti. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandhoti? siyā pārājikāpattikkhandho siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandho siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandho. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? eke ^a^M0.0012^ea^ samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca ^a^T0.0016^ea^ cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti? āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammatīti? tīhi samathehi sammati -- siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? paññatti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti? paññatti pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ. kā vipattīti? asaṃvaro vipatti. kā sampattīti? saṃvaro sampatti. kā paṭipattīti? na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. {a0 ni0 10.31} kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññattoti ^a^P5.0008^ea^? dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññatto -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, saṅghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya. ke sikkhantīti? sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti. ke sikkhitasikkhāti? arahanto sikkhitasikkhā. kattha ṭhitanti? sikkhākāmesu ṭhitaṃ. ke dhārentīti? yesaṃ vattati te dhārenti. kassa vacananti? bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. kenābhatanti? paramparābhataṃ --

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ methunaṃ ^a^V0.0056^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa; yebhuyyena khāyite ^a^T0.0081^ea^ sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa; vaṭṭakate {vivaṭakate (syā0)} mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa -- methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ adinnaṃ ādiyanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? adinnaṃ ādiyanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa; atirekamāsakaṃ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa; māsakaṃ vā ūnamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa -- adinnaṃ ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ sañcicca ^a^M0.0056^ea^ manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati? sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. manussaṃ odissa opātaṃ khaṇati ``papatitvā marissatī''ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa; marati, āpatti pārājikassa -- sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? asantaṃ ^a^V0.0057^ea^ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa; ``yo te vihāre ^a^T0.0082^ea^ vasati, so bhikkhu arahā''ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa -- asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
[06] cattāro pārājikā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ceteti upakkamati ^a^P5.0034^ea^ muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa; payoge dukkaṭaṃ.

[03] mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ āmasati, āpatti thullaccayassa; kāyapaṭibaddhena kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati, avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa; kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] attakāmapāricariyā ^a^M0.0057^ea^ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^T0.0083^ea^. mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa; tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] sañcarittaṃ samāpajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati paccāharati ^a^V0.0058^ea^, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa; paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ anāgate, āpatti thullaccayassa; tasmiṃ piṇḍe āgate, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ anāgate, āpatti thullaccayassa; tasmiṃ piṇḍe āgate, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa; okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^T0.0084^ea^. anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa; okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
[03] saṅghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] bhedakānuvattakā ^a^P5.0035^ea^ bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya {samanubhāsiyamānā (syā0)} na paṭinissajjantā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi ^a^M0.0058^ea^ thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya {samanubhāsiyamāno (syā0)} na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^V0.0059^ea^. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gaṇhāti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; gahite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññātakaṃ ^a^V0.0060^ea^ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; viññāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññātakaṃ ^a^M0.0059^ea^ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; viññāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vikappaṃ āpajjati ^a^T0.0086^ea^, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vikappaṃ āpanne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vikappaṃ āpajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vikappaṃ āpanne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. abhinipphādeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; abhinipphādite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] anādiyitvā ^a^P5.0036^ea^ tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

[03] anādiyitvā ^a^T0.0087^ea^ ^a^V0.0061^ea^ purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] eḷakalomāni ^a^M0.0060^ea^ paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ tiyojanaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. dhovāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dhovāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gaṇhāti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; gahite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. samāpajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; samāpanne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. samāpajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; samāpanne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[06] kosiyavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 164^b^.^eb^ atirekapattaṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] ūnapañcabandhanena ^a^T0.0088^ea^ pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] atirekamāse ^a^V0.0062^ea^ sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. pariyesati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pariyiṭṭhe nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. acchindati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; acchinne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] sāmaṃ ^a^M0.0061^ea^ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vāyāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vāyāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vikappaṃ āpajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vikappaṃ āpanne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] accekacīvaraṃ ^a^P5.0037^ea^ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] tiṇṇaṃ ^a^T0.0089^ea^ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. pariṇāmeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pariṇāmite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[06] pattavaggo tatiyo.
[06] tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ sampajānamusāvādaṃ bhāsanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? sampajānamusāvādaṃ bhāsanto pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ^a^V0.0063^ea^ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa; bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; ``yo te vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahā''ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa; sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ -- sampajānamusāvādaṃ bhāsanto imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
[03] omasanto ^a^M0.0062^ea^ dve āpattiyo āpajjati. upasampannaṃ omasati, āpatti pācittiyassa; anupasampannaṃ omasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] pesuññaṃ upasaṃharanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. upasampannassa ^a^T0.0090^ea^ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati, āpatti pācittiyassa; anupasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vācento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vāceti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. deseti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. āroceti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ārocite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. āroceti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ārocite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pathaviṃ ^a^T0.0091^ea^ ^a^V0.0064^ea^ khaṇanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khaṇati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pahāre pahāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] musāvādavaggo paṭhamo.
[03] 166^b^.^eb^ bhūtagāmaṃ ^a^P5.0038^ea^ pātento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. pāteti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pahāre pahāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] aññenaññaṃ ^a^M0.0063^ea^ paṭicaranto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. anāropite aññavādake aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; āropite aññavādake aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ ujjhāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ujjhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ujjhāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ leḍḍupātaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ ^a^T0.0092^ea^ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nikkaḍḍhati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nikkaḍḍhite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] saṅghike ^a^V0.0065^ea^ vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. abhinisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; abhinisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dvattipariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. adhiṭṭheti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; adhiṭṭhite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñcanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. siñcati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; siñcite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] bhūtagāmavaggo dutiyo.
[03] 167^b^.^eb^ asammato ^a^M0.0064^ea^ bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ovadati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ovadite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ovadati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ovadite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhunupassayaṃ ^a^T0.0093^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ovadati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ovadite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] ``āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī''ti bhaṇanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhaṇati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; bhaṇite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. deti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] aññātikā ^a^P5.0039^ea^ bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. sibbeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ārāpathe ārāpathe āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuniyā ^a^V0.0066^ea^ saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. abhiruhati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; abhiruḷhe āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ``bhuñjissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuniyā ^a^T0.0094^ea^ saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] ovādavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ tatuttari ^a^M0.0065^ea^ āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] gaṇabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] paramparabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dvattipattapūre pūve paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gaṇhāti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; gahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^V0.0067^ea^. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena ^a^T0.0095^ea^ vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. tassa vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; bhojanapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] adinnaṃ ^a^M0.0066^ea^ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] bhojanavaggo catuttho.
[03] 169^b^.^eb^ acelakassa, vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ ^a^P5.0040^ea^ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. deti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dinne āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ -- ``ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā''ti ^a^T0.0096^ea^ tassa dāpetvā vā ^a^V0.0068^ea^ adāpetvā vā uyyojento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. uyyojeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; uyyojite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] tatuttari bhesajjaṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; viññāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] uyyuttaṃ ^a^M0.0067^ea^ senaṃ dassanāya gacchanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^T0.0097^ea^. gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; yattha ṭhito passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vasati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vasite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] uyyodhikaṃ gacchanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; yattha ṭhito passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] acelakavaggo pañcamo.
[03] 170^b^.^eb^ majjaṃ ^a^V0.0069^ea^ pivanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ``pivissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hāseti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; hasite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] udake kīḷanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. heṭṭhāgopphake udake kīḷati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; uparigopphake kīḷati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] anādariyaṃ karonto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kate āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhiṃsāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; bhiṃsāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jotiṃ samādahitvā visibbento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. samādahati ^a^T0.0098^ea^, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; samādahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nahāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] anādiyitvā ^a^P5.0041^ea^ tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhutte āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] bhikkhussa ^a^M0.0068^ea^ vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhutte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa ^a^V0.0070^ea^ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. apanidheti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; apanidhite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] surāmerayavaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati? sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. anodissa opātaṃ khaṇati -- ``yo koci papatitvā marissatī''ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; manusso tasmiṃ papatitvā marati, āpatti pārājikassa; yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ ^a^T0.0099^ea^ papatitvā marati, āpatti thullaccayassa; tiracchānagato tasmiṃ papatitvā marati, āpatti pācittiyassa -- sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
[03] jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhutte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ukkoṭeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ukkoṭite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. upasampādeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; upasampādite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ ^a^M0.0069^ea^ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pāpikāya ^a^V0.0071^ea^ diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto ^a^T0.0100^ea^ dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. sambhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; sambhutte āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ ^a^P5.0042^ea^ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. upalāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; upalāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] sappāṇakavaggo sattamo.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno -- ``na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso, etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmī''ti bhaṇanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhaṇati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; bhaṇite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] vinayaṃ vivaṇṇento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vivaṇṇeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vivaṇṇite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mohento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. anāropite mohe moheti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; āropite mohe moheti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa ^a^M0.0070^ea^ kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paharati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pahate āpatti pācittiyassa ^a^T0.0101^ea^.
[03] bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggiranto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. uggirati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; uggirite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ ^a^V0.0072^ea^ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃsento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. anuddhaṃseti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; anuddhaṃsite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. upadahati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; upadahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ``sossāmī''ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; yattha ṭhito suṇāti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khiyyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; khiyyite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. parisāya hatthapāsaṃ vijahantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa; vijahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] samaggena ^a^T0.0102^ea^ saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khiyyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; khiyyite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. pariṇāmeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pariṇāmite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] sahadhammikavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ pubbe ^a^M0.0071^ea^ appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pavisanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] ratanaṃ ^a^P5.0043^ea^ ^a^V0.0073^ea^ uggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gaṇhāti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; gahite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pamāṇātikkantaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite ^a^T0.0103^ea^ āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pamāṇātikkantaṃ nisīdanaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pamāṇātikkantaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pamāṇātikkantaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] cīvaraṃ kārāpento kati āpattiyo āpajjati? sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti ^a^M0.0072^ea^, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite āpatti pācittiyassa -- sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
[06] rājavaggo navamo. khuddakā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ aññātikāya ^a^T0.0104^ea^ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa -- aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
[03] bhikkhuniyā vosāsantiyā na nivāretvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.

[03] sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.

[03] āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati? āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā ^a^T0.0105^ea^ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^P5.0044^ea^. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ^a^M0.0073^ea^ ajjhohāre āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa -- āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
[06] cattāro pāṭidesanīyā niṭṭhitā.

[03] bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? rājagahe paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? rājagahe paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? devadattaṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ ^a^T0.0125^ea^ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] bhedakānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? rājagahe paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? sambahulā bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ eke ^a^M0.0088^ea^ samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? kosambiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] kuladūsakassa ^a^V0.0095^ea^ bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ ^a^T0.0126^ea^ vatthusminti? assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā bhikkhū chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattanti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? chabbaggiyā bhikkhū udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato...pe0....
[06] katthapaññattivāro niṭṭhito paṭhamo.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ methunaṃ ^a^V0.0096^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^P5.0051^ea^? methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati -- akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa; yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa ^a^M0.0089^ea^; vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; jatumaṭṭhake pācittiyaṃ -- methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā imā ^a^T0.0127^ea^ catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] adinnaṃ ādiyanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? adinnaṃ ādiyanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa; atirekamāsakaṃ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa; māsakaṃ vā ūnamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa -- adinnaṃ ādiyanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. manussaṃ odissa opātaṃ khaṇati ``papatitvā marissatī''ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa; marati, āpatti pārājikassa -- sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? asantaṃ ^a^V0.0097^ea^ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa, ``yo ^a^T0.0128^ea^ te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā''ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa -- asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
[06] cattāro pārājikā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; ceteti ^a^M0.0090^ea^ upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa; payoge dukkaṭaṃ -- upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati -- avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa; bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ āmasati, āpatti thullaccayassa; kāyapaṭibaddhena kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; aṅgulipatodake pācittiyaṃ -- kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati ^a^T0.0129^ea^ avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa; kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; paṇḍakassa ^a^V0.0098^ea^ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa; tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] sañcarittaṃ samāpajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati paccāharati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa; paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa; paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ {ekapiṇḍe (syā0)} anāgate āpatti thullaccayassa; tasmiṃ piṇḍe āgate āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] mahallakaṃ ^a^M0.0091^ea^ vihāraṃ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ anāgate, āpatti thullaccayassa; tasmiṃ piṇḍe āgate āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo ^a^T0.0130^ea^ vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa; okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.

[03] bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa; okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
[03] saṅghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo ^a^V0.0099^ea^ āpajjati -- ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati -- ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa...pe0....

[03] anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā ^a^P5.0052^ea^ karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ ^a^M0.0092^ea^ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. dukkaṭaṃ -- anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
[06] katāpattivāro niṭṭhito dutiyo.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ methunaṃ ^a^V0.0100^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti? methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyā sīlavipattiṃ siyā ācāravipattiṃ...pe0....

[03] anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati? anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati -- ācāravipattiṃ.
[06] vipattivāro niṭṭhito tatiyo.

[03] anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā? anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā -- dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.

[03] anādariyaṃ ^a^M0.0094^ea^ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati? anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati -- siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
[06] samathavāro niṭṭhito sattamo.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ methunaṃ ^a^T0.0134^ea^ ^a^V0.0105^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo ^a^P5.0053^ea^ āpajjati. akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa; yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa; vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; jatumaṭṭhake pācittiyaṃ -- methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti? sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā? channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti? catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ? sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti? tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti -- siyā sīlavipattiṃ siyā ācāravipattiṃ. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ catūhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā -- siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. sattannaṃ samathānaṃ, tīhi samathehi sammanti -- siyā sammukhāvinayena ca, paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca...pe0....

[03] anādariyaṃ paṭicca ^a^T0.0135^ea^ udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati? anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. dukkaṭaṃ -- anādariyaṃ paṭicca ^a^M0.0095^ea^ udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati? sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā? channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti? catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ ^a^V0.0106^ea^ adhikaraṇaṃ? sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati? sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati -- ācāravipattiṃ. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā -- dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ. sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati -- siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti.
[06] samuccayavāro niṭṭhito aṭṭhamo.
[06] aṭṭhapaccayavārā niṭṭhitā.
[06] mahāvibhaṅge soḷasamahāvārā niṭṭhitā.
[06] bhikkhuvibhaṅgamahāvāro niṭṭhito.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ yaṃ ^a^T0.0136^ea^ ^a^P5.0054^ea^ ^a^M0.0096^ea^ ^a^V0.0107^ea^ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ? kaṃ ārabbha? kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ? atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti? sabbatthapaññatti, padesapaññatti? sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti? ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññatti? catunnaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ? katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati? catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti? sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho? channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti? catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ? sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati? ko tattha vinayo? ko tattha abhivinayo? kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ? kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ? kā vipatti? kā sampatti? kā paṭipatti? kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ? kā sikkhanti? kā sikkhitasikkhā? kattha ṭhitaṃ? kā dhārenti? kassa vacanaṃ? kenābhatanti?

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ ^a^T0.0137^ea^ vatthusminti? sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññattīti? ekā paññatti. anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi. sabbatthapaññatti ^a^V0.0108^ea^, padesapaññattīti? sabbatthapaññatti. sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññattīti? asādhāraṇapaññatti. ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññattīti? ekatopaññatti. catunnaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannanti? nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannaṃ. katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchatīti? dutiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati. catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipattīti? sīlavipatti. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandhoti? pārājikāpattikkhandho. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? ekena samuṭṭhāne ^a^M0.0097^ea^ samuṭṭhāti -- kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato. catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇanti? āpattādhikaraṇaṃ? sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammatīti? dvīhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? paññatti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti? paññatti pātimokkhaṃ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṃ. kā vipattīti? asaṃvaro vipatti. kā sampattīti ^a^T0.0138^ea^? saṃvaro sampatti. kā paṭipattīti? na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. {a0 ni0 10.31} kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattanti? dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ -- saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, saṅghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya. kā sikkhantīti? sekkhā ca puthujjanakalyāṇikā ca sikkhanti. kā sikkhitasikkhāti? arahantiyo {arahantā (ka0)} sikkhitasikkhā. kattha ṭhitanti? sikkhākāmāsu ṭhitaṃ. kā dhārentīti? yāsaṃ vattati tā dhārenti. kassa vacananti? bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. kenābhatanti? paramparābhataṃ --

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā! iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ ^a^T0.0143^ea^ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā''ti uyyojentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ arabbhāti? aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? aññatarā ^a^V0.0113^ea^ bhikkhunī --``kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā! iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā''ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ avassutā ^a^T0.0183^ea^ ^a^V0.0139^ea^ bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati? avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī ^a^P5.0072^ea^ tisso āpattiyo āpajjati ^a^M0.0127^ea^. adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa; ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa; kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa -- avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī kati āpattiyo āpajjati? vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa; vematikā paṭicchādeti, āpatti thullaccayassa; ācāravipattiṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa -- vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati? ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne ^a^T0.0184^ea^ āpatti pārājikassa -- ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

[03] aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī kati āpattiyo āpajjati? aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī tisso āpattiyo ^a^V0.0140^ea^ āpajjati. purisena -- ``itthannāmaṃ okāsaṃ {itthannāmaṃ gahanaṃ (sī0), itthannāmaṃ gabbhaṃ (syā0)} āgacchā''ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; purisassa hatthapāsaṃ okkantamatte āpatti thullaccayassa; aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūreti, āpatti pārājikassa -- aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
[06] pārājikā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṃ karontī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ekassa āroceti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyassa āroceti, ^a^M0.0128^ea^ āpatti thullaccayassa; aḍḍapariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] coriṃ vuṭṭhāpentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti saṅghādisesassa ^a^T0.0185^ea^.

[03] samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osārentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantī ^a^P5.0073^ea^ tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ``khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti thullaccayassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti saṅghādisesassa; udakadantaponaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] ``kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ ^a^V0.0141^ea^ anavassutā! iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā''ti uyyojentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti thullaccayassa; bhojanapariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā ^a^T0.0186^ea^; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; ^a^M0.0129^ea^ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[03] saṃsaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyo tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

[03] ``saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. mā tumhe nānā viharitthā''ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
[06] saṅghādisesā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 230^b^.^eb^ pattasannicayaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] akālacīvaraṃ ``kālacīvara''nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhājāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; bhājāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] bhikkhuniyā ^a^V0.0142^ea^ saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindantī dve āpattiyo ^a^T0.0187^ea^ āpajjati. acchindati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; acchinne nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; viññāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññadatthike ^a^M0.0130^ea^ parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] aññadatthikena ^a^T0.0188^ea^ parikkhārena aññuddisike ^a^P5.0074^ea^ puggalikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] atirekacatukkaṃsaparamaṃ garupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[03] atirekāḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ lahupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; cetāpite nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
[06] nissaggiyā pācittiyā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 231^b^.^eb^ lasuṇaṃ ^a^V0.0143^ea^ khādantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. khādissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. saṃharāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; saṃharāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] talaghātakaṃ ^a^M0.0131^ea^ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kate āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] jatumaṭṭhakaṃ ādiyantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ādiyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, ādinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] atirekadvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantī dve āpattiyo ^a^T0.0189^ea^ āpajjati. ādiyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ādinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. chaḍḍeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; chaḍḍite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. chaḍḍeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; chaḍḍite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] naccaṃ ^a^V0.0144^ea^ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] lasuṇavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī ^a^T0.0190^ea^ dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] paṭicchanne ^a^M0.0132^ea^ okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] ajjhokāse ^a^P5.0075^ea^ purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[03] rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa; hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā tiṭṭhati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

[03] purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ anovassakaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] vikāle ^a^T0.0191^ea^ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. abhinisīdati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; abhinisinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] duggahitena ^a^V0.0145^ea^ dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ujjhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ujjhāpite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. abhisapati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; abhisapite āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vadhati rodati, āpatti pācittiyassa; vadhati na rodati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
[06] rattandhakāravaggo dutiyo.
[03] 233^b^.^eb^ naggā ^a^M0.0133^ea^ nahāyantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nahāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pamāṇātikkantaṃ udakasāṭikaṃ kārāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kārāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kārāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva ^a^T0.0192^ea^ sibbentī na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ. cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhārentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. dhāreti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dhārite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kate, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dhammikaṃ ^a^V0.0146^ea^ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭibāhati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭibāhite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. deti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dinne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dubbalacīvarapaccāsā ^a^P5.0076^ea^ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. atikkāmeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; atikkāmite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭibāhati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭibāhite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] nahānavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 234^b^.^eb^ dve ^a^T0.0193^ea^ ^a^M0.0134^ea^ bhikkhuniyo ekamañce tuvaṭṭentiyo dve āpattiyo āpajjanti. nipajjanti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nipanne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dve bhikkhuniyo ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭentiyo dve āpattiyo āpajjanti. nipajjanti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nipanne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kate, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhentī na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. nikkaḍḍhati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; nikkaḍḍhite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] saṃsaṭṭhā ^a^V0.0147^ea^ bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ; kammavācāpariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] tiroraṭṭhe ^a^T0.0194^ea^ sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭipajjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paṭipanne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhunī cārikaṃ na pakkamantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[06] tuvaṭṭavaggo catuttho.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ rājāgāraṃ ^a^M0.0135^ea^ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; yattha ṭhitā passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhutte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] suttaṃ kantantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. kantati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; ujjavujjave, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] gihiveyyāvaccaṃ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; kate, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] bhikkhuniyā ^a^P5.0077^ea^ ^a^V0.0148^ea^ -- ``ehāyye imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī''ti vuccamānā -- ``sādhū''ti ^a^T0.0195^ea^ paṭissuṇitvā neva vūpasamentī na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. deti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; dinne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhuñjati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhutte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. pariyāpuṇāti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] tiracchānavijjaṃ vācentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vāceti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] cittāgāravaggo pañcamo.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ jānaṃ ^a^M0.0136^ea^ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantī dve āpattiyo ^a^T0.0196^ea^ āpajjati. paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] bhikkhuṃ akkosantī paribhāsantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. akkosati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; akkosite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] caṇḍīkatā ^a^V0.0149^ea^ gaṇaṃ paribhāsantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. paribhāsati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; paribhāsite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ``khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī''ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa; ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] kulaṃ maccharāyantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. maccharāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; maccharite, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. ``vassaṃ vasissāmī''ti senāsanaṃ paññapeti pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapeti pariveṇaṃ sammajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa; saha aruṇuggamanā āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhunī ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] uposathampi ^a^T0.0197^ea^ na pucchantī ovādampi na yācantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.

[03] pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpentī dve ^a^P5.0078^ea^ āpattiyo āpajjati. bhedāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; bhinne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[06] ārāmavaggo chaṭṭho.
[03] 237^b^.^eb^ gabbhiniṃ ^a^M0.0137^ea^ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] pāyantiṃ ^a^V0.0150^ea^ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu ^a^T0.0198^ea^ asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhantī nānuggaṇhāpentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[03] sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsentī na vūpakāsāpentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. pācittiyaṃ.
[06] gabbhinīvaggo sattamo.
[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ūnavīsativassaṃ ^a^M0.0138^ea^ ^a^V0.0151^ea^ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.
[03] paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati. vuṭṭhāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ; vuṭṭhāpite, āpatti pācittiyassa.

[03] aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ^a^T0.0210^ea^ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto? kaṃ ārabbha? kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ...pe0... kenābhatanti?

[03] yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti ^a^M0.0147^ea^? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti ^a^V0.0164^ea^? thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññattīti? ekā paññatti. anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthi. sabbatthapaññatti, padesapaññattīti? sabbatthapaññatti. sādhāraṇapaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññattīti? asādhāraṇapaññatti. ekatopaññatti, ubhatopaññattīti? ekatopaññatti. catunnaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannanti? nidānogadhaṃ nidānapariyāpannaṃ. katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchatīti? tatiyena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati. catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipattīti? sīlavipatti. sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandhoti? saṅghādisesāpattikkhandho. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti? dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato; siyā kāyato ca vācato cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0... kenābhatanti? paramparābhataṃ --
[21] upāli dāsako ceva, soṇako siggavo tathā.
[22] moggaliputtena pañcamā, ete jambusirivhaye.. ...pe0....
[21] ete nāgā mahāpaññā, vinayaññū maggakovidā.
[22] vinayaṃ dīpe pakāsesuṃ, piṭakaṃ tambapaṇṇiyāti..

[03] coriṃ ^a^T0.0211^ea^ vuṭṭhāpanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? thullanandā bhikkhunī coriṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti -- siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato; siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] ekā gāmantaraṃ gamanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, tisso anupaññattiyo. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- paṭhamapārājike...pe0....

[03] samaggena ^a^M0.0148^ea^ saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ ^a^V0.0165^ea^ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāraṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ^a^T0.0212^ea^ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sundarīnandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- paṭhamapārājike...pe0....

[03] ``kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā! iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā''ti uyyojanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? aññatarā bhikkhunī -- ``kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā! iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā''ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ ^a^T0.0213^ea^ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti...pe0....

[03] kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca -- ``buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṃ paccācikkhāmī''ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ^a^M0.0149^ea^. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] kismiñcideva ^a^V0.0166^ea^ adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca -- ``chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo''ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] saṃsaṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā ^a^T0.0214^ea^ saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṃsaṭṭhā vihariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] ``saṃsaṭṭhā ^a^P5.0083^ea^, ayye, tumhe viharatha. mā tumhe nānā viharitthā''ti uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññatto. kaṃ ārabbhāti? thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? thullanandā bhikkhunī -- ``saṃsaṭṭhāva ayye, tumhe viharatha. mā tamhe nānā viharitthā''ti uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti -- dhuranikkhepe...pe0....

[03] dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti? sāvatthiyaṃ paññattaṃ. kaṃ ārabbhāti? chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha. kismiṃ vatthusminti? chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ekā paññatti, ekā anupaññatti. channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti...pe0... ^a^T0.0215^ea^.
